title: authorize the erection of a building or the use of premises for a public service undertaking, Government, Semi-Government, Local Bodies for public utility purposes only, where he finds such an authorization to be reasonably necessary for public convenience and welfare, even if it is not permitted in any land use classification/zone by a special permission
clause_text: authorize the erection of a building or the use of premises for a public service undertaking, Government, Semi-Government, Local Bodies for public utility purposes only, where he finds such an authorization to be reasonably necessary for public convenience and welfare, even if it is not permitted in any land use classification/zone by a special permission.
